macroSpec.desc: controls the inclusion, in the DTD, of element and attribute declarations for the mixed combined base.
混合タグ集合(mixed)向け要素宣言と属性宣言を，DTD に埋め込む制御を行う．

remarks.p: To include elements and attributes for the mixed base in the DTD, the user should declare this entity with a value of INCLUDE; this will override the default.
